issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.

fields.summary: MobileWeb: HTTPClient send() throws CORS errors when posting some data, but works with no data

comments.body: Marking ticket as "Won't Fix" as MobileWeb has been deprecated.
